attributes.action: Reject The Human Rights Act in cases such as Abu Qatada
attributes.additional_details: The Government must immediately set up a cross party committee to legislate that The Human Rights Act shall not be adhered to in cases such as Abu Qatada. We The People of The United Kingdom are just tired of the cross party sniping, bickering & attempts to make political mileage whilst issues such as the Qatada debacle stumble on costing the tax payer a fortune. In line with The People's demands, ALL political parties MUST work together to reject this bill of Human Rights & return legislation of this sort back to where it belongs...Westminster. Failure to do so shall see you all punished at the ballot box!
